member.summary: Looks for Identity()-steps and removes them.

member.name: T:Gremlin.Net.Process.Traversal.Strategy.Optimization.IncidentToAdjacentStrategy
member.summary: Replaces .OutE().InV() with .Out(), .InE().OutV() with In() and .BothE().BothV() with Both().

member.name: T:Gremlin.Net.Process.Traversal.Strategy.Optimization.InlineFilterStrategy
member.summary: Analyzes filter-steps with child traversals that themselves are pure filters.

member.name: T:Gremlin.Net.Process.Traversal.Strategy.Optimization.LazyBarrierStrategy
member.summary: Inserts Barrier()-steps into a where appropriate in order to gain the "bulking optimization".

member.name: T:Gremlin.Net.Process.Traversal.Strategy.Optimization.MatchPredicateStrategy
member.summary: Folds any postWhere() step that maintains a traversal constraint into Match().

member.name: T:Gremlin.Net.Process.Traversal.Strategy.Optimization.PathProcessorStrategy
member.summary: Helps to ensure that more traversals meet the local child constraint imposed on OLAP traversals.

member.name: T:Gremlin.Net.Process.Traversal.Strategy.Optimization.RangeByIsCountStrategy
member.summary: Optimizes any occurrence of Count()-step followed by an Is()-step.

member.name: T:Gremlin.Net.Process.Traversal.Strategy.Verification.LambdaRestrictionStrategy
member.summary: Does not allow lambdas to be used in a .

member.name: T:Gremlin.Net.Process.Traversal.Strategy.Verification.ReadOnlyStrategy
member.summary: Detects mutating steps and throws an exception if one is found.
